Class Composite3D

java.lang.Object

                      org.nschmidt.ldparteditor.composites.Composite3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable, IScalable
public class Composite3D
extends ScalableComposite

This is the composite for a 3D OpenGL perspective. This object can be divided into two.

Author:
nils
